Aktivität 1st Assignment: Research Exposé. due April 28th auswählen
Research need and justification: what does literature say about your topic, what is it not talking about? Why is your research needed? (short overview of the the literature)
Aktivität 2nd Assignment: Methodology Component. due May 15th auswählen
Please prepare a short 2-3 minute presentation on a methodology component and either upload here, or send to ines.wolf@tu-berlin.de
Half of you will be chosen to present.
Please select the "group"(methodology concept) for the second assignment. Single or group assignment possible.
You may get in touch with your collegues and work on the presentation together.

– What is it, why is it
important and how to achieve it? For Qualitative and for quantitative research

– What sort of samplings are there?
When do you choose which? Pro and Cons?
Effect Size and Significance, Sample Size.

How does
effect size help interpret results? When is something statistically significant
related to effect size?

What is
meant by these terms, why are they important and how do quanti / quali studies
may approach these issues?

Variables, Dependent and Independent Variables vs.
Constructs.

How can you identify and define independent and dependent
variables? In what ways do constructs differ from variables in qualitative
research? What does Operalization have to do with these?

What is meant by these terms and what are
their purposes in quali and quanti research?
Aktivität 3rd Assignment: Prepare the Peer Review due May 22nd auswählen
3rd Assignment: Prepare the Peer Review due May 22nd
Review your colleagues research exposé and provide support.
How clear is their research problem and purpose?
What about the research question and proposed research design?
How can they narrow their research scope?
What perspectives can you add? Suggestion for research lens or framework? Any sources you can share?
